clinical_features.concept: Prosthetic for above-knee, vein for below-knee/tibial

sources.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.

clinical_pearls: Use vein for the distal (below-knee) segment where prosthetic fails
Sequential design adds intermediate outflow improving proximal patency
Consider vein patch at distal anastomosis of prosthetic if minimal vein
